title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Critical Companion Learning for Integrating Palliative Care in Nursing Homes

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three policy development and implementation strategies for palliative care approaches in nursing home settings.
Learners can propose solutions to ethical dilemmas in end-of-life care scenarios using VR simulations.
Learners can design a knowledge-sharing system within a team by applying the critical companion model and report at least one practical implementation case.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
